title: XO Communications Selects Dialogic for Virtual Platform Transformation
text:
XO uses Dialogic PowerMedia XMS for their customer experience applications.
Parsippany, NJ
Dialogic , a global networking software and infrastructure solution provider, announced today that XO Communications (XO) has selected the Dialogic® PowerMedia XMS media processing solution to support virtualization for certain hosted voice applications.
“Virtualization promises increased operational efficiency and cost effectiveness for businesses,” said Amador Lucero, Chief Operating Officer at XO Communications. “We are pleased to incorporate the Dialogic solution to support the transformation of our hosted voice applications to a virtualized platform. The Dialogic platform enables us to rapidly introduce next-generation applications to our customers.”
“We are excited to provide the Dialogic PowerMedia XMS as a key ingredient in the XO virtual platform transformation,” said Jim Machi, Senior Vice President of Product Management and Marketing at Dialogic. “Our highly-scalable platform delivers state-of-the-art call completion, and multi-media services that are advantageous in today’s market while supporting future, next-generation services. The Dialogic PowerMedia Media Resource Broker (MRB) also enables telco scalability, all in a software platform, designed to fulfill service providers’ needs as they move their networks to the cloud.”
Moreover, XMS supports other key functionalities such as message session relay protocol (MSRP) for enhanced texting and WebRTC voice (Opus), and video codecs (VP8 and VP9), which can enable additional future services on the same platform. PowerMedia XMS is fully software-based and is on a path to support network functions virtualization (NFV) as more service providers build it into their cloud infrastructures for operational and capital expenditure savings.
